DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , randomize , multicenter , multinational , randomize ( 1:1 ) study . The aim study assess importance functional assessment coronary artery disease prior bypass surgery . In particular , FFR-guided strategy compare traditional Angio-guided strategy guidance surgical revascularization aorto-coronary bypass grafting .
DOC.brief_title: Graft Patency After FFR-guided Versus Angio-guided CABG ( GRAFFITI ) Trial
DOC.criteria: Patients stable angina , unstable angina NSTEMI candidate CABG Significant LAD and/or LM lesion prove FFR Angiography AND At least one , angiographycally intermediate lesion Significant valvular disease indication surgical replacement Severe leave ventricular dysfunction ( EF < 35 % ) Acute STEMI Atrial fibrillation , Maze procedure plan
